instructors.name: Fran Hampel
instructors.description: Fran brings years of classical violin experience and a passion for teaching students of all ages.

instructors.name: Connor Wilson
instructors.description: Connor specializes in acoustic and electric guitar, covering rock, pop, and classical styles.

instructors.name: Ryan Milliken
instructors.description: Ryan is an experienced guitarist with expertise in multiple genres and teaching methods.

instructors.name: Demetrio Navarro
instructors.description: Demetrio is a classically trained pianist with extensive experience in both classical and contemporary music.

instructors.name: Alex Olesen
instructors.description: Alex is a versatile drummer who plays everything from jazz to rock, focusing on technique and musical expression.

instructors.name: Margo Macdonell
instructors.description: Margo specializes in classical piano and helps students develop both technical skills and musical expression.

instructors.name: Vernon Wills
instructors.description: Vernon brings a wealth of experience in both acoustic and electric guitar instruction.

instructors.name: Katrina Jordan
instructors.description: Katrina is passionate about helping students discover their musical potential through piano.

instructors.name: Mario Sota
instructors.description: Mario teaches both guitar and ukulele, making music accessible and fun for students of all ages.

instructors.name: Yelena Yermolayeva
instructors.description: Yelena is a classically trained pianist with international performance experience.

instructors.name: Ken Murdoch
instructors.description: Ken is a multi-talented musician who teaches both drums and guitar with equal expertise.

instructors.name: Kurtis Downs
instructors.description: Kurtis specializes in contemporary guitar styles and helps students develop their unique sound.

instructors.name: Roland Griffith
instructors.description: Roland brings decades of piano experience and a patient, encouraging teaching style.
